name: Body Souffle
description: This nutrient-rich smoothie of a lip balm—infused with 8 nourishing plant oils and butters—is a 2-in-1 treatment + overnight mask for soft, supple lips..

name: Charcoal mask
description: This vegan buttery-rich purifying charcoal & chia face mask clears the way so that all skin types—even dry skin—can be left purified and comfortable Free of animal-derived ingredients 3

name: Ginger body cream
description: A whipped body cream with our signature, spicy Ginger aroma.

name: Ginger body scrub
description: Skin-scouring Dead Sea Salts and warming Ginger Zest cushioned in emollient-rich Macadamia, Soybean, Kukui Nut and Sweet Almond Oils removes all traces of roughness to buff every bit of you.

name: Hand and body lotion
description: Our silky hand and body lotion with Hyaluronic Acid and Apricot Oil hydrates, improves barrier strength and imparts radiance—while it reveals softer, smoother skin over time

name: hand treatment
description: Self-hydrating Rose of Jericho plus skin-reviving Trehalose and Sea Haricots work hand-in-hand to help skin recover from dramatic dehydration

name: lip butter
description: This nutrient-rich smoothie of a lip balm—infused with 8 nourishing plant oils and butters—is a 2-in-1 treatment + overnight mask for soft, supple lips

name: Masking essentials
description: 2-in-1 mask exfoliates dead surface cells and gently deep cleans to diminish the appearance of pores and helps restore the look of clarity

name: On the spot
description: A soul-soothing, sensory treatment that helps you find your inner peace, on-the-spot.

name: recovery for dry skin
description: Skin-nourishing Shea and Cocoa Butters, Sunflower, Soybean and Ginseng Oils and Gentian Root help rapidly refresh, renew and replenish even the driest body skin.

name: skin scent
description: Ginger Essence is our signature ginger perfume and a fan-favorite since 2000.

name: Smoothing ginger body scrub
description: Smoothing Sugar gently buffs away rough, dry skin, then transform into a creamy, cleansing lather. Leaves skin soft, refreshed, reinvigorated. Lightly scented with the irresistible aroma of Ginger..
